dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 1037 IH: Occupational Therapy in Mental Health Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Tonko (for himself, Ms. Brown of Florida, and Ms. Slaughter) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to include occupational therapists as behavioral and mental health professionals for purposes of the National Health Service Corps.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Occupational Therapy in Mental Health Act.

section.header: Including occupational therapists as behavioral and mental health professionals for purposes of the National Health Service Corps
section.text: Section 331(a)(1)(E)(i) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 254d(a)(1)(E)(i)) is amended by inserting occupational therapists, after psychiatric nurse specialists,.
